00034 def horizontal_sine_wave(start,base=np.pi):
00035         waypoints=[]
00036         x=np.linspace(start[0],start[0]+base,10)
00037         y=np.sin(x)
00038         for i in range(len(x)):
00039                 waypoints.append((x[i],y[i],start[2]))
00040         return waypoints
00041 
00042 def vertical_sine_wave(start,base=np.pi,axis='x'):
00043         waypoints=[]
00044         x=np.linspace(start[0],start[0]+base,10)
00045         y=np.sin(x)
00046         if axis=='x':

00048                         waypoints.append((y[i],start[1],x[i]))

00050                 for i in range(len(x)):
00051                         waypoints.append((start[0],y[i],x[i]))
